_description: Metrical history of Birth and Life of Christ, one portion — short couplets

BLAdd39996.First Lines:
Vppon þe hilles coppe wakingeAȝeyn þe tyme þe
                    sterre schold springe…
BLAdd39996.Last Lines:
…Wiþ his disciples he lenged stilleAl þe whyle
                    þat was his wille
BLAdd39996.Editions:
Stine,  Shirley Packard,
                        ed.  
             “The Metrical Life of Christ: Edited from MS BM Additional
                39996.” 
         Diss. University of Pennsylvania, 1962 [DA 23.1010].
